description:
On days where a down jacket is a bit much, a down vest can be perfection. Wrapping your core in quilt-like warmth, the Gotham down vest uses recycled materials to keep you toasty. Baffles of lightweight down hold your warmth close. While a recycled polyester shell stops winter winds in their tracks.

  • Recycled polyester shell is wind and water resistant
  • PFC-free DWR finish shakes off light rain and snow
  • 600-fill power recycled waterfowl down provides pillowy warmth
  • High insulated collar delivers scarf-like coziness
  • Bellows hand pockets for keeping hands warm and must-haves safe
  • Lined with a smooth polyester for easy layering
  • Standard fit has a trim silhouette while leaving just enough room to layer
name: The North Face Gotham Vest - Women's
